column5: This Executive furnished apartment features a 1200 sq/ft 2 bed / 2 bath with a spacious family room. It sleeps 6 people comfortably. It includes a fully equipped kitchen with modern appliances, and everything that anybody would need to cook up a delicious meal. The pool view apartment also features dramatic nine-foot ceilings,Ceramic tile entries, Custom trim & Crown moldings, Ceiling fans, Built-in Computer desks Oversized garden tubs, Expansive walk-in closets and full size washer and dryer.
column8: Pool View 2 Bedroom/2 bath in The Woodlands 32HP05
